## Useful Info

A **firespitter statue** is a hostile [statue](/Statue "Statue")-type monster, capable of blasting trespassers with powerful [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic"). They can be found guarding certain [vaults](/Vault "Vault") in the [Volcano](/Volcano "Volcano"), usually positioned in such a way that you must cross a large room to reach them.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                      |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame") (3d7)                      | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Sticky Flame Range](/Sticky_Flame_Range "Sticky Flame Range") (3d4) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") (3d16)               | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d16)                  | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- This statue may have some allies accompanying it. Lure them away and kill them in a safe place rather than rushing in and attempting to fight everything at once. Once everything else is taken care of, then you can worry about the statue.
- Obviously, [fire](/Fire "Fire") resistance will come in handy if you need to get within range of its spells. Most humanoids in the Volcano will be wearing armour which offers rF+, so if your body armour lacks that ego, consider switching for the duration of the fight. The loss of a few points of AC or EV are less important than adding an extra chunk of resistance.
- Characters with ranged weapons or spells that can target anything on screen can simply blast it at the edge of their line of sight, retreating if injured to safety. It's somewhat durable, but its lack of regeneration makes this strategy a valid option.
- [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") is your friend, as it can't see you. Hasted and buffed you can solve the task in melee without risking much spell attacks.
- [Silence](/Silence "Silence") could also be helpful if you are a melee character.

## History

- Firespitter statues were added in [0.8](/0.8 "0.8") and removed in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19").
